Name: Gin Atomic
Ingredients: 2 dash Fee Brothers Lemon Bitters optional
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist..
Lightly MUDDLE basil (just to bruise) in base of shaker.
Add next 4 ingredients and SHAKE with ice.
POUR tonic water into the shaker before FINE straining into ice-filled glass.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A nuclear gin and tonic - or at least, one that simply radiates flavour.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2007 by Brendan Mainini at The Ambassador Bar in San Francisco, California.
